login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account
login.error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

forgot.title: Reset Password
forgot.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgot.success_message: If an account exists with {{email}}, we've sent a password reset link. Please check your inbox.
forgot.error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

reset.title: Create New Password
reset.subtitle: Enter your new password below
reset.password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character.
reset.success_message: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.
reset.error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

errors.title: Invalid Link
errors.invalid_link: This password reset link is invalid or missing. Please request a new one.
errors.invalid_token: This link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new password reset.
errors.token_used: This password reset link has already been used. Please request a new one.
errors.weak_password: Password doesn't meet requirements. Please use at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character.

signup.title: Create Account
signup.subtitle: Sign up to get started
signup.error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
signup.invitation_note: You're signing up to accept an invitation. After creating your account, you'll be able to review and accept the invitation.

initiate.title: Get Started
initiate.subtitle: Enter your email to create an account
initiate.success_message: We've sent a verification link to {{email}}. Please check your inbox and click the link to complete your registration.

complete.title: Complete Your Account
complete.subtitle: Fill in your details to finish signing up

errors.invalid_token: This link is invalid or has expired
errors.token_used: This link has already been used
errors.weak_password: Password must be at least 8 characters

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome_subtitle: Here's what's happening with your business today

view.subtitle: View and manage your organization details

edit.error_generic: Failed to update organization. Please try again.

organization.no_organization_message: You need to be part of an organization to view this page.
organization.error_loading: Failed to load organization details. Please try again.

validation.password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.subdomain_min_length: Subdomain must be at least 3 characters
validation.subdomain_max_length: Subdomain must be at most 63 characters
validation.subdomain_invalid_format: Subdomain can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens. Must start and end with a letter or number
validation.version_format: Version must be in format: X.Y.Z (e.g., 1.0.0)

common.error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

team.title: Team Members
team.subtitle: Manage your organization's team ({{count}} members)

delete.title: Remove Team Member
delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from the team? This action cannot be undone.

delete.title: Delete Role

hero.title: Deploy Mobile Apps with Confidence
hero.subtitle: Streamline your mobile app deployment process with powerful build management, channel distribution, and team collaboration tools.

features.title: Everything you need to deploy mobile apps
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed for modern development teams

build_management.title: Build Management
build_management.description: Upload, organize, and track your mobile app builds with version control and metadata management.

channel_distribution.title: Channel Distribution
channel_distribution.description: Create and manage distribution channels for different environments like production, staging, and beta.

team_collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
team_collaboration.description: Invite team members, manage roles and permissions, and collaborate effectively on app deployments.

api_integration.title: API Integration
api_integration.description: Seamlessly integrate with your CI/CD pipeline using our comprehensive REST API.

faster_deployments.title: Faster Deployments
faster_deployments.description: Reduce deployment time from hours to minutes with our streamlined process.

better_organization.title: Better Organization
better_organization.description: Keep your builds organized with clear versioning and channel management.

team_efficiency.title: Team Efficiency
team_efficiency.description: Enable your team to work together seamlessly with role-based access control.

reliable_platform.title: Reliable Platform
reliable_platform.description: Built for scale with enterprise-grade reliability and security.

cta.title: Ready to streamline your mobile app deployments?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who trust Kitbase for their mobile app deployment needs.
